hero.description: A simple way to explore and compare computer science curricula from top universities. Find the right classes for your learning journey in one searchable index.

mission.label: Project Overview
mission.desc_1: CodeCampus is an independent project that gathers public course catalogs from top schools like MIT, Stanford, and Berkeley into one easy-to-use search tool.
mission.desc_2: We don't host the classes. Instead, we organize scattered info—like what you need to know before joining and how hard a course is—to help you plan your own studies.

universal_index.title: All in One Place
universal_index.desc: Search through a combined list of courses from top universities without jumping between different websites.

progress_analytics.title: Track Your Learning
progress_analytics.desc: Keep a simple log of the classes you've finished and see how your skills are growing over time.

gap_analysis.title: Plan Your Path
gap_analysis.desc: Compare what you've learned against real degree requirements to see what classes you should take next.

pricing.label: Membership
pricing.desc: Choose the level of insight that fits your personal learning journey.

free.name: Starter
free.desc: Essential tools for finding and tracking courses.

pro.name: Professional
pro.desc: Advanced analytics for serious learning planning.

footer.copyright: © 2026 CodeCampus Catalog. A helpful tool for learners.

search.label: Course Registry Search
search.title: What do you want to learn today?
search.placeholder: Search by course name, code, or university...

courses.view_details_prefix: View course details and requirements on
courses.empty_desc: No courses found matching your current filter parameters.

roadmap.title: Learning Roadmap
roadmap.empty_desc: Your roadmap is currently empty. Explore the course catalog to start your first study plan.

profile.stat_depth_desc: Total curriculum breadth spanning across university catalogs.
profile.stat_mastery_desc: Verified completion of specialized university modules.
profile.stat_focus_desc: Your primary area of demonstrated academic activity.
profile.stat_diversity_desc: Percentage of available university catalogs explored.
profile.github_desc: Primary authentication source for your study data.
profile.google_desc: Secondary login method for backup access.
profile.apple_desc: Secure access via your Apple ecosystem.
profile.delete_desc: Permanently remove your account and erase all study data from the CodeCampus system.
profile.delete_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete your profile and all course progress. This cannot be undone.
